name: totes
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used as a short form of
totally to emphasize what you are saying: You're totes right. I am totes going to buy those shoes.
More examplesFewer examplesI am totes going to change my Twitter bio.The fishcake was totes moreish. I could definitely have eaten about 5 of them.I read his blog, and I am totes a fan.
